summary: Adds an enchanted ring that contains the enchantments of the Rings of Night combined.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a ring that has the enchantments of the \"Ring of The Beast\", the \"Ring of Eruide\" and the \"Amulet of Bats\" combined.

Location:
Inside the Volhikar Keep, besides Harkon\'s throne(The one in the main hall).

Requirements:
Obviously, it requires Dawnguard.

Installation:
Drop the .esp into your data directory and activate it from the Launcher or the NMM, simple, isn\'t it?

Credits:

Nexus for the vast database of mods.
Bethesda for the Elder Scrolls series.
author: Epzaos
